snippet.title: Songs of Silence - Map #5 - TactiCon 2024 Trailer | Art Nouveau-inspired Fantasy Strategy Game
snippet.description:
Are you already excited about the Lorelai Campaign? 
Watch the Reveal Trailer for the next Map, revealed at Tacticon 2024! 

Songs of Silence is an Art Nouveau-inspired turn-based strategy game with a unique mix of turn-based kingdom management, hero development and real-time combat.

🗓️ coming on November 13th, 2024 to PC, PlayStation and Xbox

🟠 Steam — https://store.steampowered.com/app/2195410/Songs_Of_Silence/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=description&utm_campaign=ea&utm_term=2024&utm_content=sos-map5-native
🟢 Xbox — https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/songs-of-silence/9nlz55vqrpgn
🔵 PlayStation — https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011866/

🎮 Epic 4X fantasy strategy game 
⚔️Fast-paced, tactical gameplay
🎨 Art Nouveau-inspired visuals 
👥 Multiplayer support for up to 5 players
🌍 A rich world filled with stories and secrets 
🎼 An epic OST by Hitoshi Sakimoto (Final Fantasy Tactics) 

📜 Official Website — https://songs-of-silence.com/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=description&utm_campaign=ea&utm_term=2024&utm_content=sos-map5-native
📰 Press Kit — https://impress.games/press-kit/rcp/songs-of-silence
